column2: This small hangar is used to store the few fighters of the local militia. These fighters are used for local law enforcement and to deter the casual pirate.
This expanded fighter hangar now stores more squadrons allowing system authorities to more readily respond to threats.
Heavy Fighter is a misnomer. Heavy Fighter Hangars allow for denser deployments due to launch mechanic refinements and fighter design optimizations.
With rapidly expanding defense commitments, a central location to coordinate defensive actions is now necessary.
This large facility allows the massive rapid deployment and rearmament of multiple squadrons simultaneously.
